Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ship

  • public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for generating ships and randomly placing them on the map. Singleton Design Pattern was used because only 1 ship object is needed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createShips(Board board)
      Creates desired number of ships and randomly determines their size, orientation, and location on board.
      static Ship getInstance() 
      int hitsRequired() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Ship getInstance()
        Returns:
        The single instance of Ship object.

      • createShips

        public void createShips(Board board)
        Creates desired number of ships and randomly determines their size, orientation, and location on board.
        Parameters:
        board - The game board where ships are being placed.

      • hitsRequired

        public int hitsRequired()
        Returns:
        Total number of hits required to win a game.
